ideas.title: Quantifying Market Creation: A Comparative Analysis of Blue Ocean vs Red Ocean Strategies
ideas.description: Develop metrics to measure market creation and value innovation in both blue and red ocean contexts, using historical data from various industries.
ideas.methodology: Use market size data, revenue growth, and innovation indices to compare companies that pursued each strategy.
ideas.expected_results: Companies pursuing blue ocean strategies show higher long-term growth and sustainability metrics.

ideas.title: Value Innovation Dynamics in Emerging Markets
ideas.description: Study how blue ocean strategies perform in emerging markets compared to developed markets.
ideas.methodology: Compare market entry strategies and success rates across different market contexts.
ideas.expected_results: Blue ocean strategies may be more effective in emerging markets due to less established competition.
